LanguageData.JRWYutyrannusReconstruct.label: Yutyrannus
LanguageData.JRWYutyrannusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #04729-2015 [YUTYRANNUS HUALI] CODENAME: BEAUTY >422
A medium sized theropod with a hide speckled with filamentous feathers that align down its back. It is able to survive in colder climates than most species.
